record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - June 04, 2008)

[Page: H4937]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend and insert extraneous material on H.R. 3021.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
